definition: Sirius, a double star in constellation Canis Major 大犬座

sentences.english: This group of false gods chose Sirius to attempt this reinstatement within.
sentences.chinese: 這一羣虛假神選擇了天狼星來嘗試這種內在恢復。

sentences.english: The Sirians sacrificed the life of Terra to regenerate and ascend.
sentences.chinese: 天狼星人犧牲了Terra的生命來再生和提升。

sentences.english: Sirius was astronomically the foundation of their entire religious system.
sentences.chinese: 天狼星是他們全部宗教系統天文學上的基礎。
但是小天狼星沒有出現。

sentences.english: Dumbledore's sad eyes moved back to Sirius.
sentences.chinese: 鄧不利多悲傷的眼睛轉向小天狼星。

sentences.english: Ah, well this has to do with the Sirian High Priests.
sentences.chinese: 啊，這是和天狼星的高級祭司有關係的。

sentences.english: Sirius is in the constellation Danis Major the Greater Dog. It's often called the Dog Star.
sentences.chinese: 明亮的天狼星位於大犬星座內，也時常被稱爲犬狼星。

sentences.english: Bunkeflo should not be underestimated of course, but over evens for Sirius at home gets my approval at least.
sentences.chinese: 當然邦克福洛不能被輕視，但天狼星的主場更可取。

sentences.english: Sirius wouldn't have wanted you to inquire about that.
sentences.chinese: 小天狼星也不會希望你問起這些事。

sentences.english: Sirius also became the godfather of Harry Potter.
sentences.chinese: 後來小天狼星成爲波特的教父。

sentences.english: Regulus was the younger brother of Sirius Black.
sentences.chinese: 雷古勒斯是小天狼星布萊克的弟弟。

sentences.english: People touched the heart is the mysterious death of Sirius .
sentences.chinese: 讓人觸動心玄的就是天狼星的死。

sentences.english: It was searching the train for Sirius Black.
sentences.chinese: 它在火車上搜尋小天狼星布萊克。

sentences.english: One can learn from the lessons of Sirian ascension why this is not wise.
sentences.chinese: 你可以從天狼星提升課程中學到爲什麼這是不明智的。

sentences.english: Such humans were seeded upon earth by the Sirian human civilization.
sentences.chinese: 這種人類是天狼星文明播種於地球的。

sentences.english: Once again Sirian jurisdiction failed to adequately observe or intervene;
sentences.chinese: 再一次，天狼星的管轄者未能充分察覺或干涉。

definition: Sagittarius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
